A C F G M P R S T 

A

addFlight(Setup) - Method in class cctair.FlightAddition
Method used to add a flight through user input
Aircraft - Class in cctair
An Aircraft object stores characteristics commonly shared by any type of aircraft.
Aircraft(int, Pilot, String) - Constructor for class cctair.Aircraft
Constructor for the Aircraft object receiving its capacity, its aircraft type and an object of type Pilot.
Airplane - Class in cctair
An Airplane object stores characteristics inherited from the Aircraft class and also ones specific to airplanes.
Airplane(String, String, int, AirplanePilot) - Constructor for class cctair.Airplane
Constructor for the Airplane object receiving its make (or brand), its model, its maximum capacity and an AirplanePilot object.
AirplanePilot - Class in cctair
An AirplanePilot object holds characteristics of its parent class Pilot and ones unique to it.
AirplanePilot(String) - Constructor for class cctair.AirplanePilot
Constructor accepting only a String with the pilot's name (usually only used in the Setup class for default pilots).
AirplanePilot(String, ArrayList<Airplane>) - Constructor for class cctair.AirplanePilot
Constructor accepting a String with the pilot's name and an array list containing Airplane objects which the pilot is able to fly.
assignPilot(Pilot) - Method in class cctair.Aircraft
Assigns a pilot to the aircraft
